==Chinese==
{{zh-forms|10,000-[[Chinese mile|mile]]<br>{{nowrap|([[immeasurably]] [[long]])}}|{{nowrap|The Long Wall}}<br>{{nowrap|([[Great Wall of China|The Great Wall]])}}|s=万里长城|type=22}}
{{wikipedia|Great Wall of China}}

===Etymology===
From the idiomatic sense of {{m|zh|萬}} as any uncountable or unimaginably large number. As a whole the name, translated literally, means "10,000-[[li]] long wall".
